thread.title: Waikato’s walking warriors win top PR campaign award (The University of Waikato)
thread.title_full: Waikato’s walking warriors win top PR campaign award (The University of Waikato) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Waikato’s walking warriors win top PR campaign award (The University of Waikato)
text: ( Source : The University of Waikato ) A team of University of Waikato students that inspired 230 strangers to get more physically active and walk nearly 10 million steps in five days has won the 14th Chesterman Group Public Relations Campaign
